Package org.apache.logging.log4j.kit.env.support

Class ClassLoaderPropertyEnvironment

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.kit.env.support.BasicPropertyEnvironment
org.apache.logging.log4j.kit.env.support.ClassLoaderPropertyEnvironment
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyEnvironment
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompositePropertyEnvironment
public abstract class ClassLoaderPropertyEnvironment extends BasicPropertyEnvironment
An environment implementation that uses a specific classloader to load classes.
